languages.text: "Я обычно предпочитаю договоры дракам. Драки портят имущество и расходуют ресурсы. Но в твоем случае, боюсь, радикального решения не избежать".
"I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."
languages.original_text: "Я обычно предпочитаю договоры дракам. Драки портят имущество и расходуют ресурсы. Но в твоем случае, боюсь, радикального решения не избежать".

traits.locale_text: "I usually prefer talks over fights. Fights ruin property and waste resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that a radical solution is inevitable."
"I usually prefer talks over fights. Fights ruin property and waste resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that a radical solution is inevitable."
"I usually prefer talks over fights. Fights ruin property and waste resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that a radical solution is inevitable."
"I usually prefer talks over fights. Fights ruin property and waste resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that a radical solution is inevitable."
"I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."
"I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

languages.text: “通常情况下，我更喜欢谈判，而不是战斗。战斗会破坏财产，浪费资源。但在这种情况下，恐怕我只能采取极端措施。”
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: “通常情况下，我更喜欢谈判，而不是战斗。战斗会破坏财产，浪费资源。但在这种情况下，恐怕我只能采取极端措施。”

languages.text: «Suelo preferir negociar antes que hablar. El combate destruye la propiedad y malgasta recursos. Pero, en este caso, hacen falta medidas extremas».
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: «Suelo preferir negociar antes que hablar. El combate destruye la propiedad y malgasta recursos. Pero, en este caso, hacen falta medidas extremas».

languages.text: 「普段は戦闘よりも交渉派だ。戦いは財産を破壊し、資源を浪費する。しかしお前が相手なら、強硬手段を取る必要があるかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: 「普段は戦闘よりも交渉派だ。戦いは財産を破壊し、資源を浪費する。しかしお前が相手なら、強硬手段を取る必要があるかもしれないな」

languages.text: "Normalerweise ziehe ich Verhandlungen dem Kampf vor. Kämpfe zerstören Eigentum und verschwenden Ressourcen. Aber in Eurem Fall fürchte ich, dass extreme Maßnahmen unvermeidbar sind."
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: "Normalerweise ziehe ich Verhandlungen dem Kampf vor. Kämpfe zerstören Eigentum und verschwenden Ressourcen. Aber in Eurem Fall fürchte ich, dass extreme Maßnahmen unvermeidbar sind."

languages.text: « Je préfère généralement négocier plutôt que me battre. Les combats détruisent les biens et gâchent des ressources. Mais dans votre cas, je crains que des mesures extrêmes s'imposent. »
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère généralement négocier plutôt que me battre. Les combats détruisent les biens et gâchent des ressources. Mais dans votre cas, je crains que des mesures extrêmes s'imposent. »

languages.text: "Genelde pazarlığı kavgaya yeğlerim. Zira dövüşler, mülkleri yok edip kaynak israfına sebep olur. Korkarım bu vakada uç tedbirlere başvurmam gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "I usually prefer negotiating to fighting. Fighting destroys property and wastes resources. But in your case, I'm afraid that extreme measures must be taken."

traits.locale_text: "Pazarlığı kavgaya yeğlerim genelde. Dövüşler mülkiyeti yok edip kaynakları israfına sebep olur ama korkarım bu vakada uç tedbirlere başvurmam gerekecek."
